author: andschwa
body: Up and down arrows work, but after executing a command, I expected up arrow to go to the last command, instead it behaves as if I was still going through the history from the previous time I searched it. VSO create date - 12/18/2015 16:17:00     VSO closed date - 12/22/2015 10:20:00
title: Executing command doesn't reset history index
